Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Simple, durable designInexpensiveRelatively low ink costsFree app for printing from iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
Cons: Can't adjust photo setting in Pic FlickLow color print resolutionLong setup process
You don't have to spend a lot to get a printer that's connected and smart phone-friendly. For $99, the Kodak ESP C310 lets you print wirelessly from your PC or iOS device and helps you keep saving money with low-cost ink cartridges. While this all-in-one doesn't offer the bells and whistles and sky-high resolution of higher-end machines, the C310 gets the job done.
Item.HelpfulCount: 4 out of 4 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
The Kodak ESP C310 has a strong range of connection types. Besides the obligatory USB 2.0 you also get Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n (which is very straightforward to get working) and additional options for those with iPhones, iPads, iPod touches or BlackBerry devices.
Kodak's latest printers come with universal software, so if you install more than one model from the series on the same PC then you won't have to load up the software twice. The setup process is very convenient, and besides the usual helpsheet on setting up the printer, you also get a full manual in a petite easily-portable size - very much preferable to simply receiving a disc containing a PDF of the instructions.
See also: Group test: what's the best inkjet printer?
Speed isn't the Kodak ESP C310's greatest a ... sset, with text performance being no better than average. The two bottom quality modes produce figures of 10.7 pages per minute (ppm) and 3.9ppm. You'll really need to look to the second of the two modes in order to get good quality text. But you won't have to wait too long, and the output is pleasing. While the characters aren't perfectly formed, the text is nice and dark. In the top mode, the speed of 2.1ppm is palatable, although the results still don't match those of the best inkjets.
The general turn of speed isn't perhaps good enough to want to churn out too many batches of text. And the performance, sadly, doesn't accelerate when you get to graphics, producing figures of 4.4ppm and 1.9ppm in the draft and normal modes. The output is very nice, with a balanced and considered colour palette that's neither too pale nor too intense. We didn't find many faults with banding, although colour gradients aren't perfectly rendered. And the results with photo paper are fizzing with life. We quite like the quality of the C310, if not the speed.
The scanning component is strong, with the Kodak ESP C310 producing colourful scans with good attention to detail. The rigid lid isn't great for fitting in bulky material though, and an Automatic Document Feeder would also have gone down well. The C310 uses the same cartridge system as the office-oriented Kodak ESP Office 2170 – a simple two-tank system covering black and colour cartridges. However, given the 2170's great running costs, that's very much a good thing. The C310 is astonishingly cheap for colour output, costing around 3.3p for a page of colour. Our tests on the starter cartridge suggested it should get very close to this figure, making it fantastic value.
The Kodak ESP C310 comes with an additional fun feature – 3D printing. This allows you to create three dimensional versions which can be viewed using any cheap 3D spectacles – no need to spend £60-£100 on eyepieces here. Indeed, Kodak even provide a couple of low-end pairs. The results aren't stunning, and the process of creating your own shots is by no means easy. In all honesty, this is more of a neat gimmick than a ground-breaking departure. However, we can see the more resourceful and patient users squeezing a few hours of fun out of shooting their housepets in full 3D.
As is typical of inkjets, the paper is fed from the tray at the rear of the Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One, and finished prints are pushed on to the front support. Kodak says the rear paper tray is easy-to-use and very quick for changing paper type and it certainly is, although we haven't had any problem with other styles of input. You can put in up to 100 sheets of plain paper, or you can take them out and drop in 20 sheets of photo paper. It's a slick and simple system, but it does lack the flexibility of those models with dual paper trays.
See also: Group test: what's the best multifunction printer?
The Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One is an enticing-looking printer that, depending on your taste, may sit very nicely indeed. Some of today's multifunction printers are a blur of curved edges and polished surfaces, but the Kodak ESP C310 is a little sober, with its matt black casing leavened only by the bright orange strip that runs along the front of the Kodak –... expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: THIS IS AN EXCELLENT BUY!!! I would recommend this printer to anyone who needs a printer, be a first one or an update. It was so easy to set up and to change the paper size. I printed some pictures on the sample photo paper and they were like real photos.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Not much
Cons: Jammed easily. Very poor quality.
I was offered $40 off the price of a Kodak or a Canon printer when I bought a new laptop. I already had a Canon, with which I was very happy, but had never had a Kodak. I thought that with their background in photography, Kodak should be good, so I ordered it. I noticed that its weight was considerably lighter than other printers that I have had. There was a reason for this. It was made of rather flimsy plastic. It was reasonably easy to set up and connect to my wireless network and worked well for a few weeks. Yesterday I was trying to print some emails for a meeting. The printer would print the page OK, but then the paper feeder would reverse and suck the page back into the printer causing a paper jam. After the 10th ... time that this happened, I had had enough. I packed everything up and returned it to Best Buy. Their representative in the computer section was very gracious offering me a replacement printer made by Canon or Epson. Since the Canon that I already owned had been working well for over a year, I chose the Canon. I noticed immediately that the Canon was considerably heavier than the Kodak. Much pleased with the Canon and the service that I received from Best Buy.
In a nutshell...don't buy a Kodak printer. There is a reason why that company has gone bankrupt. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A great printer at a great price
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Compact Design
Cons: Slow Print Time; Jams Easily
Needs information screen raised some and tilted for easier reading. Paper feed very sensative or it will pull paper into machine at an angle and jam but has been easy to remove jammed paper. I love the low ink usage and cost Would buy Kodak again if this one were stolen or damaged
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: great value
Cons: color inks in one cartridge
Wanted a Kodak printer because their ink is so much cheaper than other brands. A little disappointed that the colors are in one cartridge, not individual cartridges. This means when one color runs out, the whole cartridge has to be replaced. Very easy to set up wireless printing.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything, NOT one complaint.
Cons: Nothing.
I was very surprised at the quality and ease of use of this Copy/Printer/Scanner. I am using the Wireless option and have no problems. Good quality Pictures and clear print. Easy to understand use, through wireless. It looks great, nice size and would recommend this printer for businesses and home photo users as well. Very satisfied.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This Kodak all-in-one printer replaced another similiar model that I had. A feature of the Kodak printers is that they are a mite noisy! This one, however, not so as my previous, The, relative, cheap purchase price of the print cartridges make them an attractive buy. However, they seem to dry up very quickly, and my previous printer's live was short - it was not overworked, and it was "fed" with authentic Kodak cartridges. it was easy to install. As indicated, a reliable worker when operating.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: An economic and compact option for a home printer/scanner/copier. I found it very easy to install and set up the wireless connection. Any instances where the connection was lost and the print job cancelled were due to my dodgy connection rather than the printer. One minor gripe is that I can't work out how to scan multiple pages into one document, even though reviews elsewhere on the internet said this was possible. Otherwise I've been very impressed with the performance of this printer.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Not had chance to try it out much yet but this printer is good value for money. If it lives up to it's promise to be economical on ink it will be ideal. Print quality good, speed fine for me. Clearly marked. buttons and controls. Easy to use - a neat little printer all round. Would recommend.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I found the Kodak ESP C310 all in one Printer easy to set up and easy to operate. Print quality is very good with good colours and definition. I am looking forward to saving some money when I have to buy ink.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I decided on this printer as the ink is so much cheaper than others with the same features. It was a little difficult to set up more to do with my wi-fi connection and my dvd drive not working but kodak got back to me quickly to resolve this. The prints are good even on mediocre paper but I would prefer not to get the white borders on photo prints. I would recommend this as a good all rounder.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Nice little printer, much smaller than the one it's replaced.
Was very easy to set up and install the software. Print quality is good and and once it gets printing it is quick but it does take quite a while to actually get ready to print once switched on.
Looking at the cost of ink it appears good value, so as I say, so far so good!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Quality printer at a low price
Item.Review: I bought this so I could print from my iPad. Although the printer doesn't have AirPlay it's so easy to print to I email document straight to the printer and pictures are printed via an app. The print quality is fine and cost of running the printer is really cheap. I'm really pleased.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: So impressed with this printer. set up was so easy. Print quality excellent though not printed a picture yet.! Great Speed, compact, nice looking with a black matt finish. great value.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I found that this was the printer I needed. I have had a lot of printers over the years and one of the problems has always been the cost of running them, so if I wanted a print I would go to a shop that could print them. I am now disabled and it isn't easy getting around. I can now make fantastic prints, cheap and good quality ink and paper and easy to use, and I can send photos from my i-phone is a real bonus.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Great printer and cheaper ink than other brands. Easy to set up, printing in no time. work well on my WiFi hotspot set up on my HTC phone. I would recommend to anyone. Great for the price. I did not think the printer was noisy compared with others. But the scanner was noisy when the scanner light goes back. But all in all I would get Kodak again now.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Decent copies
Cons: The software, Everyhting wireless
I have spent the last hour trying to get this hunk of junk to print and the most I've gotten out of it was half of a document. The USB printing is passable and the instant copies are decent, but any claim that this printer works wirelessly is pure fiction. On top of all of that, the ink is not such a bargain as they lead you to believe. I am on my 3rd set of cartridges and I've only printing a couple hundred pages of word and web documents on standard or draft modes. They may be slightly cheaper than some of the competitors, but they make up for it in lack of print volume. Furthermore, they require you to install their annoying piece of junk software to even use the stupid thing. I tried to bypass the software and pr ... ogram the wireless drivers manually through the hardware manager but to no avail. This printer offered a lot of pretty nice features and for a reasonable price... unfortunately most of it doesn't work reliably. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The printer proved easy to setup and use. Print quality is excellent and printing is fast. The consumables are quick and easy to replace. On the downside the printer itself does not "feel" particularly robust. My main issue with the printer was the support provided by Kodak. The printer is not natively supported by Windows, so a driver must be installed, when installing the driver the installation software installs much additional software that is neither needed or particularly useful and can not be removed without removing the printer driver. Additionally, if you need to use the most up to date driver, then this needs to be downloaded, what Kodak don't tell you is that the driver cannot be downloded by itself, you must also download, and install, a large amount of additional software, whi ... ch is not required and is not particularly useful, this means that a good broadband connection must be available. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Exceptionally easy to set up and register compared to other printers I've bought and installed. No irritating sales promo pop-ups either.Scanning programme to file or email also simple. Only downside is that it's a constant magnet for dust because of its 'orange skin' surface but will forgive that for the cheapness of the replacement ink cartriges. Otherwise, suits my needs perfectly at a sensible price, especially as a Sale item..

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Good all round printer, prints fast and precise. Documents are well layed out with good overall colours. Photos are reasonable, for day to day snapshots, but not up to standards for digital SLR camera's quality. Nice size and build, but photo quality lets it down. even when using Kodak's own premium glossy photo papers.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The ease and simplicity of the Kodak Printer I purchased was brilliant. Within 10 minutes I had set the printer up and was ready to go the picture quality is amazing. I would recommend it to anyone who has little or no experience with computers as well as anyone who is computer literate. Fantastic value for money.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: You get what you pay for! That's for sure!
Item.Review:
Pros: It's easy to set up. Good document printer.
Cons: I would say it's really not meant for photo scanning/printing
I recently got this printer so I would be able to scan pictures to my computer and print pictures. Well I can scan and print pictures fine, but as for scanning them to my computer they come up as unreadable files. Also scanning photos to a memory card that's a joke. I had an older HP photo printer and it allowed me to do a lot more. I'm disappointed that I went cheap and got this. The quality of the picture you get from it is good but not great. Wireless printing works great. I guess I can't really complain because in this case you are definitely getting what you paid for and I wanted to try to save a buck. I wish I would have gone with my instinct and got a C ... annon or Lexmark. If you are just looking for a basic printer and scanner then this is ok, but if you are going to be using it more for the photo part of it definitely go with something else. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I did some researching and this is one of the best all in ones if you're on a budget not wanting/needing to use it a ton. Setup was easy and it has worked fine. Thanks B&H for have a great price w/ great service.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The printer is a good value for money although the speed is on the slow side a bit. The CD provided didn't worked on the laptop but just on the computer so I had to download the drivers from the internet. The quality of the pictures is good

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Easy to set up the Wi-Fi and able to print in no time at all. Tried using existing stock of Xerox photo paper and it smudged. Using the provided (3 x 6 by 4) Kodak photo paper immediately dry. Kicked my Canon into touch because of high cost of consumables. Kodak much more reasonable in this respect. Altogether a very satisfactory purchase.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: My bestest prezzie to me ever
Item.Review: This has got to be my best ever gift and i bought it yes... It is fast, efficient, excellent picture/photo copy. Scans beautiful quality photo's. Things are so much easier since kodak ESP C310 came into my life i recommend every one get one a great investment cheap and easy to use kids and grown ups love it....

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak EASYSHARE C310 All-in-One Ink Jet Printer (Print, Scan and Copy)
Item.Review: Good Points: Great photo quality and general print quality. Ideal for university and home use. SD card slot useful. Inks last a very long time. Great paper measuring thing where the slots join up equally on each side so your paper doesn't go wonky. Great value for money as ink is cheap. Would definitely recommend. Bad Points: Had to buy a Cable to link it to my computer as i didnt have wi-fi but you can get them for like two pounds on ebay, or in comet for about fifteen pounds. Its a bit noisy. Takes a minute or so to warm up. Attracts dust lol.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Not anything
Cons: Price, quality of print projects, cost of ink cartridge.
I bought a Kodak ESP printer, first it would not work. Kodak replaced the printer. All internal parts are plastic, it is very noisy. Print quality is mediocore at the best. Paper continually jams. Ink was initially $4.99 for black cartridge, now $19.99. Per cartridge specs, median pages able to print on one black cartridge is 472, I'm lucky to get 100; and this with minimal printing, only written pages. If superior quality photos is what you're looking for DO NOT buy any Kodak printer, they are not worth the frustration and the price!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: When I first received the package, I was like Uh-oh, this is too light and good to be true. But it is - not heavy and good for printing. The instructions to set-up the printer to be wireless are very very easy to understand. I had no problem, except my reception was weak, but that was my problem not the printer's. I use it to print documents for the most part. I've not tried photos. But it prints really good for what I use it. I also scanned like 80 pages and it was so easy to do. It's like the printer thinks like you and does what you want it to do! I REALLY like this printer/scanner/copier - guess next time I'll get one with fax, but that's going to be in a long time I think.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: My printer is missing manuals BB And Kodak won't H
Item.Review:
Pros: Help Nothing is great...
Cons: Best buy and Kodak Won't Help Me.
The printer seems OK But since I didn't receive my owners manual it is a little hard to figure how to use it. I have contacted both Best Buy and Kodak and not been able to get them to send documentation listed as being in the box. I am fed up with both companies and would like my money back. I can't believe Best buy sent this review request. They have nothing to help me with any request I have made. I now have a wireless printer I use with a USB cable because I don't know how to use it wirelessly. I think I need a wireless router but I'm not sure I bet the information is in the owners manual.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Despite help from Kodak's online support who were very good, I never did manage to get the wifi link sorted, nor did I manage to establish why it would not work (though I believe it was nothing to do with the printer itself). The simple purchase of a USB cable solved all my problems and it works fine now. Just waiiting to enjoy the publicised ink cost savings.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: There seemed to be a clash with the software for my previous all in one printer - even though I had uninstalled it - but Kodak took control of my machine and resolved it when I called their support desk. Plus points are that it is compact and easy to use. No experience yet of longevity of ink cartridges. NOTE - you will need to buy or retain a network cable as not supplied - unless you plan to just use WiFi connection.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Very good value especially as it was on sale price The print quality is excellent, and it is much quieter than our previous printer. However, you need to switch it on ahead of when you need to use it as it takes time to 'warm up.'
Although there has been no fading of the black ink it now tells me I need to change the cartidge albeit I have been printing multiple copies for a charity quiz [no more than 250].
Good cheap printer for home use.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I've found this printer very easy to install and whilst I'm not a complete techo-phobe I'm neither a techno-geek so was very pleased with how simple the set up was. I love the wi-fi connection and the print quality looks good. The only slight downside for me at present is the logistics of where the paper needs to be inserted and how this effects the size and therefore the location of where I put this printer. My last printer (HP) enabled the paper to be inserted at the front and this worked better for me. But this is a minor irritation and I have managed to work around this. Overall this has been a great purchase and I really like the cheaper ink cartridges. Also great price from Argos as printer was advertised for £20 more in other locations online.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I do not think it is emphasised enough that this "all in one" works connected to USB as well as wirelessly. Yes it is mentioned in the instructions , but I feel more should be made of this. As printers go it is not going to break any records but for the price it is perfectly adequate. Set-up is a doddle just follow the instructions never gave me any pause for thought

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Have to say this printer was very easy to set up, and works! Despite some of the reviews on here, cannot fault this printer. Staight out of the box, within 15mins printing! And unlike most things these days with technology no swearing and threatening it with a hammer to make it work! Links straight to your home wireless network, add the CD to your computer and away you go. You don't need a lead to connect, and ink appears to be pretty cheap, so what more do you want for occasional printing?

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Got it home, set it up and found out the print head was faulty, took it back the next day and had it replaced, a bit of an inconvience but as always the Argos staff were very friendy and helpful, 5 stars for customer service.
This printer is excellent, very easy to set up wirelessly, no leads required and of course the main reason i bought it was the name and price to replace the ink which was a big factor, it prints fairly quickly and has double sided capability, you can even send emails and pictures from your phone once it's set up and it will print them if it's on. It also has an Sd card reader which is handy. For the price you really can't go wrong with this printer.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: just bought this printer and after a little trouble setting it up and needing a bit of help from the husband it now works fab. really fast and excellent quality photos

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Having bought an all in one printer from a well known supermarket, I was dismayed to find it stopped working after just short of a year. I was desperate for a new printer for the children's homework and this seemed perfect for everyday use. It is perfect, it does what it says and is quick and easy to use. I would definitely recommend this product and hope to have lots more use out of it.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A good buy. The price is very reasoable
Item.Review: I wanted the ESP C315 but this model was the nearest to it. I liked the price too. The setting up was easy though somewhat different to most other printers I have used and this may cause some buyers a little confusion.but it all works out well. So far I have only printed in black but the test print one is required to carry out is in excellent colours. Now the only dislike I have with this printer is the noise level during Start Up. Normal printing noise is acceptable.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: With the rip-off prices of printer cartridges, I decided to put my existing printer to one side and invest in the Kodak. I am glad I did, as it is a great tool, especially with wi-fi, as the printer doesn't have to be next to the computer. Having a laptop as well, remote printing is easy. The set up took some time to download off the web, but all went well without hitches, so two laptops and a desktop are now remotely connected to the device, which saves hassle. The copier is superb, the colour copy is great, the cost of the replacement printer cartridges from Argos is cheap by comparrison and I am well pleased. My only gripe is the flimsiness of the power lead connector, the centre pin is tiny, so I hope it doesn't give trouble later on.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: bought this printer for just general use but does so much more..easy to set up once i read the instructions bout 10 times. lol. very happy with it..photo's are great..

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this to cut down on ink costs. We don't use it to print photo's so we can't comment on that but it prints documents well. Easy to set up, didn't even need to use the software provided as our Mac sorted it out by itself. Had a few other makes of printer and this is just as good as any.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Unfortunetly had 2 of these and both went back as wouldnt connect to wifi tried everything even did online chat with kodak with no result. On the up side easy to assemble and printed well.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This was money well spent. The set up was very easy and the colour that it produces is lovely. Very easy to use. The price of the printer was a plus, it was the cheapest among all the other companies that I had looked at, plus the ink for these Kodak printers is far cheaper than any other printer on the market. All in all a very good purchase.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: i do not print a great deal so i can not comment how it will work for frequent printers but for me it is great,so easy to set up for wireless printing(i needed a cable,that i already had, to set it up on my pc laptop though)and the quality of print is good too,i have not yet set up the cloud printing that allows you to print from your phone/tablet from anywhere but it looks very simple to do. all in all its a great printer for the money and given the low price of ink replacements you will struggle to beat it.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A lot cheaper in the long run
Item.Review: i've had Kodak printers before and I love them, the ink is a lot cheaper than other brands, so the added initial expense is warranted. Quality is brilliant and easy to set up. Also, not as bulky as some other home printers i've seen

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
In general a good value printer. Good value low cost Kodak ink.
A weakness is in the WiFi which even next to an Access Point says 90%. When less than 50% it can keep trying to reconnect giving multiple sheets of paper out for each page printed over our LAN.
Good home printer. As an office printer it must be near the WiFi.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Who's giving this thing good marks?
Item.Review:
Pros: It keeps my papers from flying away in the wind....
Cons: Other than print quality, you can just about name it...
While the print quality is good, the wireless works fine, colors are good - the durned thing constantly beefs at you to feed it ink. And worse, it won't let you continue printing when IT decides the time has come for you to replace the cartridge. Even if you're only doing BLACK copies, if the color cartridge has decided it's too low, forget it - you get NOTHING. Go buy ink. NOW. Any inkjet user KNOWS that when the WARNING comes, there's a good 15-20 copies left. Can you milk them from this cow. No way. It's so exasperating, I'm abandoning my "new" machine - I'll go back to my old DJ3200. I know. "Kodak cartridges are less expensive." Sure they are. About $20 ... vs. $25 for the "other guy's". But when you get 25% more PRINTS before you have to stop and go to the store,.... It's bye, bye Kodak time.... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: While the print quality is good, and the setup is easy, it's absolutely abhorrent the way this [*]thing PROHIBITS you from printing when your ink cartridge is low. It just refuses. Print quality is fine. Inkjet users KNOW there's another 20 or 30 prints in there, but you HAVE to throw it away and go buy another one! That's the price you pay for the lowest cost cartridges in the industry - which are about 20% lower in cost - but you get about 25% fewer prints. Thanks, Kodak - I'll be going back to HP in the VERY near future....

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Good value, but found it slow to print compared with previous Kodak printer - prob need to change to draft setting to be faster. Ease of wi-fi enables printing from children's bedrooms - no more fighting for main computer! Great to have feature of printing sheet music. Haven't used all the other features yet, but glad they are there - e.g.lti-processing of photos, downloading from mobile phone etc.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Not easy to set up. Dispite saying it would work with my network and google it didn't. Kodak support FAILED to give a solution and advised their Development Team to future proof for this error! Great! But it doesn't help me. Printer was very noisy and clunked a lot. Resulted in returning and replacing with a HP. Argos were great, Kodak weren't. I advise you give this a wide berth.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Solid basic printer for home use
Item.Review: This is a solid printer for occasional home use. The print quality is decent and fairly quick. It's a little loud, but not unbearable. Good basic printer for the money, with some really nice features like wireless connection and easy to change ink cartridges. The smartphone app that lets you send documents/photos directly to the printer over the wireless connections is a really nice plus.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: A reasonable price to buy, inks are very cheap & good quality. My husband & I use a lot of graphics in our hobby so a good printer & cheap inks are a must & this lives up to all that & more.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This is my second Kodak printer and I'm just as pleased with this one as the last. They are a bit noisy starting up but print well and the cost of the inks are a bonus.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
This printer is so easy to set up - most Wi-Fi printers I've used need to be "Hard-Wired" first to set up. But within 5 minutes this printer was up and running on the Wi-Fi and never even had to plug it into my PC via USB!!!
Print quality is excellent, fast and reasonably quiet too - PLUS cheap refill cartridges as well make this a great printer overall!!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Very pleased with my purchase. Very easy to install both on my wife's and my laptop. Good quality colour and quite fast too. Looks good and tray folds away neatly when not in use. Highly recommend.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Got this printer to replace an Epson Artison 700. The ink cartridges for the Epson cost more than the Kodak esp 310 printer and and two spare cartriges. Shipped from on line dealer in less than 24 hrs and no shipping fee. I have not used it to print photos yet. Use 4 days per week in office.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Having much experience with inkjet printers and laserjet printers, when I had to replace an expensive printer for home use, I did a ton of research. I am also a purchasing agent having reviewed and bought thousands of them. I just needed a printer for regular occasional use and the bonus was the copying and scanning. This printer's performance tops those I've bought for thousands of dollars. I know it sounds crazy, but I am in love with this item so much so that I'm addicted to printing pictures now, and scan every receipt or bill to the pc. The copy portion is just super. Buy this, you will love it!
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I frequently use the printer for printing documents and web pages, scanning, and copying (everything it is built to do). I have absolutely no complaints about it! I love that it's wireless and so easy to use, and the print quality is outstanding! If you're in the market for a printer with the capabilities of this one, don't look any further... this is the printer you've been looking for!!! I GUARANTEE YOU!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Took forever to try and setup wireless connection. In the end plugged in USB lead as this printer replaced non wireless version which was excellent. Having said this I find print quality and life of cheap printer cartridges to be excellent.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This product was purchased for personal use. The 4 stars is because it is slow, starting up and shutting down. I like lightening fast and this is not. But it prints fine quality prints and documents. I am pleased overall with its functionality , cost, ease of use, and all around quality.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Great & Economical, recommended printer A1 Quality... easy to set up unless you have a really old O/S - I was running XP SP1 which is not supported by the software provided. Software C.D will boot you out (unless you have SP-2) internet down loads and Kodak live time assist although very accommodating and helpful did not provide the solution.
Anyone one else that happens to be using XP-SP1 can get this printer going by ignoring the "do not connect USB cable" message.
Connect the cable the O/S will ask for the software by disk - this will allow the XP system to interrogate the drivers and down load what is needed. BUT the effort is worthwhile !
HIGHLY recommended and economic printer. Don’t expect instant warm up and print - but once this baby gets going it's the be ... st !!!!!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this kodak ESP C310 printer for home use. I have only had it a couple of weeks and I have not used it much so far, printed a couple of letters, which looked absolutely fine. I particularly wanted a wireless printer and this was easy to set up. It fits neatly onto the bottom shelf on the TV unit when not in use. I am very pleased with it.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Easy set up. Excellent picture quality on pictures Ink cartridges are much cheaper than our old printer so excellent savings all round. Very happy with purchase.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: The printer installation was a bit confusing and took a while. The wifi feature works great. As for printer ink, it last for 80-100 color prints of text and picture. The interesting part is that they use some of the color ink for black ink as well. The levels of the color and black ink remain somewhat close even though most of prints were black. As for photo printing... wonderful! I used the ulra premium kodak 4X6in photo paper. I printed 0.5x0.5in protraits for locket and the resolution and clarity was great! Of the photo was edited in Photoshop, but the prints were very close to what was seen on photoshop. Con: The only reason why I would give a 4 star instead of 5 star is the fact that Kodak released high premuim ink and regular ink. The difference of $10 or 200% of the orginal ink is ... definitely trying to shank the consumers. That's smart business practice, but poor practice. Prior years Kodak had the more economical means for ink and still managed for profits.. so greedy. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I decided to go with Kodak following the publicity about ink prices. The quality so far has been very good and printing time is quick. Can't comment yet on the life of a cartridge but at less than half of what I was paying previously I'm hoping it lives up to the publicity. Had a bit of a problem with the wireless connection, the printer wasn't recognised at first. In frustration left it and went back the following morning and everything sprung into life, looks like the laptop needed a reboot but couldn't see this in the instructions. I've not followed this up as it's working fine.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this due to the low price of the cartridges and good reviews. Lived up to the expectations all round. NB Comes complete with black & colour cartridges in the box.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Had difficulty with set up disc but eventually managed the task. Bought the product due to the reasonable costs of replacement inks. Hope Kodak keep the prices reasonable?

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A cost effective Printing Solution indeed!
Item.Review: Upon purchasing this item along with extra inks (starting own business so stocking up!) I found the unit easy to set up and software easy to install on 1 laptop & 1 PC. Wireless works fine. Onscreen display very clear and bright and the printer is user friendly and easy to follow. The only downside I have found is the 20+ seconds prior to each print job where it hums and ha's, but my techi friends assure me this is the norm for most lazerjet printers! I have printed circa 150 items (letters, photos, documents - using the scanner) and the inks display show about 80% remaining in both, so the ecomony of the inks will come into their own at the rate I am using it! So far so good!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this to replace Canon Pixma MP560 which only lasted 15 months. Kodak was easy to set up wirelessly, Works fine,good printing for documents, haven't tried A4 photo yet but I'm sure it will be fine.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: very easy to set up on all computers in the home and wi-fi only took about half an hour all to together. only had printer a few days but pleased with print outs up to now.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: easy to set up. good quality. simple to use. Cartridges very cheap- but quality of printing VG. Wireless setupeasy with my laptop. Kodak programme for downloading and editing easy and quick.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Best quality printer i have had.
Item.Review: I was well impressed with this printer. The printing quality is superb, not to mention how cheap the inks are for this printer. For someone like me who is not very technical the printer was easy to set up and use.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Well impressed by how easy it was to install and set up this wireless printer to all our computers and laptops. It was also set up to print wireless with my daughters IPhone. Very pleased with this purchase Recommended

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Took a while to set up as set-up disc was faulty. Kodak support very quick. Print quality excellent, print cartridge cost great! Overall, chuffed with this purchase.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: speed and noise
Good print quality but a very noisy printer. It also goes off-line from time to time but overall it was a great choice for what we do.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Paper is fed from the back and straight down (no turning in the printer which can damage the paper)
Cons: The LCD screen is very small.
Have had many printers in the past (HP, Epson, Canon). This one is by far the best. Not only is the printer inexpensive to purchase, but seems (so far) to be inexpensive to use. The print quality is exceptional. I do a lot of 8.5 x 11 and some 4x6 and 5x7's and the speed is very good. I have only had it for a few weeks and I have printed 12 4x6's and 3 5x7's and 4 8.5x11's. I am keeping track so I can see how much the ink will cost per picture printed. So far I just love this printer and would recommend it to anyone who likes to print their own pictures. Prints documents very well also.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great for the price , Not-So Great on technology
Item.Review:
Pros: Low ink cost, set up and features
Cons: Wireless connectivity not strong
It's all thumbs up on print quality, speed and features. Low cost ink a plus , but keeping it connected for wireless printing is a bit of a hassle. I have to keep restarting the printer so it can keep connecting to router. I keep updating all software from the Kodak site but doesn't help.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice printing but runs out of ink FAST
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use/nice quality
Cons: Runs out of ink fast, printed solely in black and somehow my color ink lvls dropped to nothing
I have had to run out to get ink several times because it seems to run out of ink on a monthly basis with not that often of use (maybe 5 sheets a week) printing in black. I have set it to print only in black and white but the color "runs out" even still. Like most printers, you can't print in black and white if it says it's out of color. It was a nice gimmick to get me to buy it with the "lowest ink price" but it costs more in the long run with this printer, and I like to use a printer cartridge until it's really gone #where the ink is clearly out#. It makes me not trust companies with that type of manipulation/control they try to impose.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Tricky WiFi - but overall good value
Item.Review: Nice looking - prints well, but the WiFi is tricky. Have managed to print wirelessly sometimes, but when I need to just click and print it NEVER works! So maddening. Overall, reasonable value for money tho, scanning works well wirelessly and I am sure when I spend more time fiddling with it (sigh) I will get the wireless printing to work more reliably....

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Great price, really easy to set up, love the wi-fi printing ability from my iPad & iPhone really cool function, which produces great quality prints & with much cheaper ink replacement than other printers make this a great purchase would recommend to anyone looking for a cost effective printer.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought trthis on the sale with spare ink cartridges. As a tecnophobe even I didn't make a mess of it. It didn't take long to set up and choices to make life hard! Prints lovely. Here's to longer times before I need the spare ink I bought!!!!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this printer in order to go wifi. The set up was really easy especially for someone who is not that computer literate! Good price and happy with the quality of printing.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: In need of a replacement printer I read various industry reviews and established that for my usage (moderate: home) the Kodak ESP C310 would be the best bet. The reviews were right. I'm impressed with the printer's quality and ease of use. It took a while to set up but, nevertheless, with clear instructions it was easy and presented no problems. Because it's next to my computer I'm using a USB line & not its WiFi features. Early days yet but the cost of ink/printing looks to be another winner. I can be classified as a "satisfied customer"

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: So far,so good, I had a few problems setting up, I had to do basic set up (not the recommended one) as I could not get it to print photo's Now all working well (if but a bit slow, doing photo's). Pleased the printer came with Full ink cartridges

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: looks great, prints bit slowly but quality is good. If you have another firewall instead of windows own then cumbersome to get computer to detect printer wirelessly, need to use online help for that. Also no USB cable but not needed once set up

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Product keeps failing.
This printer failed in less than 6months. Kodak sent another, That one failed. The nest one failed. Because my original purchase was made over a year ago I'm being offerd a 30% discount on a refurbished printer. I haven't gotten a full years use out of any of these printers. I will NEVER purchase another Kodak product again.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Great printer / scanner with lots of useful scan and print features, it was easy to set as a wireless scanner and the ink cartridges are really cheap, all in all a good buy

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Save your money and your time
Item.Review:
Pros: not a thing
Cons: everything
I was never so disappointed in a product as I am with the C310 by Kodak. I have spent three days trying to get this piece of garbage to work. I even had on line chat help, and let them take control of my comp. to help in setting it up. The software wont install properly...and I've used so much ink in calibrating and testing. The only thing it did well was to scan pics & docs to my comp. Im packing it up and taking it back. I've had Epsom & Lexmark all in one's and they were easy right from day one.....guess I'll stick with brands that I'm familiar with from now on.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this as a replacement for another which had broken and have not been disappointed with this printer although I can't seem to get it set up for wifi printing

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: I purchased this printer recently, and have found it to be far faster and easier to use than my old one, Another major consideration was the price of the ink cartrides, cheap and readily available, all in all a great buy. 10/10

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: the best printer I've ever had.
Item.Review: I bought this printer cos it was a kodak and was in a hurry, but didn't realise it had wi-fi printing and cloud printing as well. I still haven't bought ink refills as I'm still using the same one that came with the printer. Exquisite.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
at last, when my trustee fifteen year Epson finally took his final bow I bought a Kodak, on a friend's recommendation.
It is neat looking, works a treat, with a nice space age feel. AND their cartridges are priced at 'copies' level.
Great stuff

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: i got printer home and it was easy to set up on wireless but wifi was hit or miss as somtimes it wouldnt connect even tho printer was 3 meters away frm the router and somtimes it wouldnt turn on even tho the green light was on plus it takes bout a min or 2 to start up when u switched it on plus the print quality was avrage

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: this is a fantastic little printer i love it and would certainly recommend this if your looking for a printer with excellent results and easy set up this is the one to buy thank you argos

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Guzzles Ink.
I traded a ten year old HP inkjet printer in for this piece of junk, thinking that the functionality of this printer/scanner/copier would be better. I should've kept the old reliable printer that I had. Don't buy this. I printed in black and white, the color ink ran out (how??) and now, even though there's a full black ink cartridge, and even though it's set to black and white, it won't print until I replace the color cartridge. On top of that nonsense it sucks down the ink like crazy. The cartridges might be ten bucks but, you have to replace them ten times as often. Complete waste of money. I want my old printer back.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This is my first Kodak printer,scanner,copier - it is so easy to set up for wi fi printing - print quality is excellent- nice size printer - no noisier than my previous hp printer - would buy Kodak again - and the cartirdges are a very reasonable price too

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: Had a bit of bother finding the correct drivers online since they didn't seem to be on the CD. I found the screen on the small side to clearly see the menu's, also a bit on the noisy side when printing. Have only used once so far...so I have.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: not pleased, junk from day one
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing
Cons: everything
Kodak c310.... I have had issues from the get go.......i have this printer over a year and have had nothing but problems. can't return it without a big issue. plain junk

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: See review
This thing is a piece of garbage. Constant paper jams, refusals to print anything and burns through ink like it's free. I think Kodak employees (ex-Kodak employees?) commandeered the reviews to pump up the average rating.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: can't stay connected to NetGear wireless access points. Dont' buy this product if you want something that works!
I bought this printer about 6 months ago. It drops off my wireless router regularly and stresses me out on a regular basis. Who cares if the ink is less costly when it never works!!!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is very good for most things the only downside is set up as you have to download the drivers. As the drivers are not on disk lots of other items have to be installed at the same time which you may never use but if you have a good broadband it is not that bad all in all well worth the set up problems.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Worked a treat tthe 1st couple of times, but after that kept saying there was a problem with the print head.But once you have installed print head you cannot remove again. It would just not let me print anything again after that. So had to return for refund.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Pleased with its performance so far.
Item.Review: Thought at first the instruction booklet could have been a little more explanatory on some subjects but overhaul I found it straightforward enough, The machine itself is first class value for money and works well for average users like me, does all the things I want it to do,and all as it advertises. .

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: If you enjoy paper jams... this printer is for you
Item.Review:
Pros: Not sure
Cons: Just about everything.
I currently go to school and use my printer for printing school work (powerpoints, essays, etc.). On average, I'd say I get at least one paper jam per every 10-20 pages printed. Kodak will also say they have cheap ink (and they do). However, their ink cartridges hold very little ink, thus creating my trips to best buy or where ever for more ink. The other brands will charge you more per cartridge, but in the end you'll probably end up spending the same (if not more) for ink with a Kodak. The printer is loud and fairly slow. You get what you pay for here. Invest a little bit more money and get something worthwhile.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: its easy to set up,and the ink is so cheap compared to my old printer,its fast and quieter and produces excellent photo/print outs etc..i would recommend kodak printers i would never swap brands again.it looks stylish and its black so matches my new pc,its really easy to use and comes with great features

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Cannot understand why other reviewers had trouble setting up wi fi connection. The printing takes a little while to spool but is of excellent quality. I bought inks which I need not have done as they were included

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: ive been looking at printers for a while,wondering which ones best,this one was recomended by a friend ,i just wanted something easy for my children to use for homework,read reviews on this nearly put me off as they said it was hard to set up,but i havent got a clue about computers and i thought it was easy to set up,connected in five minutes ,prints great,children can use it,my five year old thinks its great as we can now print cbeebies,this is brilliant.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Replaced our old photosmart printer .this kodak printer is a little noisy but other than that so far it lives up to the kodak name, print ink half the price of our old cartridges.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer for the at-home user!
Item.Review:
Pros: The great Kodak support staff available to the purchasers of its fine products
I am often in need of guidance when it comes to learning the set up & operation of many of these computer related products.Kodak has very patient support staff to help in both of these catagories.This printer operates both wirelessly or with cable.The ink cartridges are low in cost & Kodak often sends deals via e-mail on shipping & reduced ink cost.Its very easy to replace ink cartridges.I go on Bing.com & download printable images & sometimes frame them--great wall or table art for home!Unit is energy star rated!Kodak often sends alerts so that when you follow their brief steps,your printer's functionality is upgraded--it becomes more efficient with less ope ... rational steps involved. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: In the catalouge the Kodak ESP_C310 printer was said to be compatable Windows XP. It appears that when trying to set it up that it is not compatable therefore it will not work through no fault of my own.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I wanted a Kodak printer for the economical ink cartridges. So far so good! I am pleased with the printer, its easy to use and the standard of printing is good for me. I work in a pre-school and need to do a fair amount of printing for that, the cartirdges seem to be holding out well so far!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this printer for my-self a while ago and was very impressed by it. I thought it would be an ideal Xmas presant for my daughter as she spend's quiet a lot printing her digital pic's.When I got it I found you can now print 3D photo's..one up on mine. She loves it..ink's are a lot cheaper than other printer's aswell..

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: as it says on the box
Item.Review: Bought this because my old printer had died of old age. Don't use a printer a lot and then mostly for document printing. Bought becuase of the widespread adverts concerning cheaper ink. Was a little worried by other reviews concerning set up but had absolutely no problems with both laptops. Would recommend.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I have only just started using this, as it was a christmas present, so have yet to see how it performs when used a lot, however, it was very easy to set up,it appears well made and the quality appears good and works very fast, which is a blessing compared to my old printer. The test will be to see how it prints photos which I have not done yet but overall I am very satisfied.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: this printer is very good and does very good print on photos and the inks are cheap in comparison with others brands, not easy for me to set up the WiFi but hey I will someday, and with the insurance breakdown 3years I am covered for any things wrong it can happened

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I have used a Kodak printer previously and loved it. So I decided to upgrade and buy a wireless printer BUT even though I key in my password to get connected it just won't let me!! However, that said, I still like the quality prints.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Bought this as it was recommended. What a problem i had with it, firstly couldnt set it up wirelessly, so went on the very helpful instant Kodak chat, was on there over half hour doing various things to try and set it up, finally it was all connected wifi and to computer, then a week later i decided i needed to print something, the printer and computer said printing but nothing was happening, i uninstalled, installed checked ink cartridges gave up and went back on the instant chat, very helpful yet again, another 40 minutes later, nothing, think this was just a faulty one so gave up and returned it, have decided to stick with my old and trusty printer non wifi instead. May i add was very noisy on start up as well, clunk click clunk click mmm.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Terrible trouble setting the WiFi up. Several calls to the help centre. They were very helpful, but time consuming. Just about to give up and return it for an HP printer on offer when it clicked into gear. Not sure if the ink is THAT much cheaper.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I bought this for my son at uni as his printing costs are high.It's the second one as i bought a higher spec one recently for home use.Cartridge replacement is cheap,Kodak quality is excellent .Sick of replacing printers due to ink costs.Wish i had bought this sooner.Fantastic value.Remember to buy a cable though,not supplied.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
I bought this printer for work purposes and haven't yet tried the photo printing, so cannot comment on that, but it was very very easy to set up, no problems with wireless settings and has made life much easier being able to print from anywhere! Being able to photocopy is very handy too.
It is a bit clunky starting up, and takes a while to warm up, but that doesn't bother me.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good Printer Iffy set up on XP
Item.Review: Prints, copies and scans well, but wireless setup on XP windows a bit trying, better use a cable if low on patience etc. Inks easy to fit and cheap to buy online. Does what it says on box and cheap printing but good quality.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Thank you Kodak! At last a printer that lets you think ahead and consider very low priced replacement ink (esp. compared to some ink!) A member of my family bought one a over a year ago and was very pleased. I needed new ink so thought I would spend that money towards this printer instead. I splashed out for the wireless connection and I Love it!! It is only used occasionaly but I'm not worried about ink! (When I bought my last printer I used the replacement ink price guide to choose it via cheapest ink, unfortunately when I got to till it was a alternative product - ink was not the same and dearer but I did not think of this until I needed new ink).

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: In the two weeks I have had this product I have found it to do exactly what it is supposed to do - quality is good and I found the cartridges better value than my previous make of printer.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter she said it works great but please note that the set up disc dident work on her lap top but she got the info of the web so was ok but she is very pleased with it

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak EASYSHARE C310 All-in-One Ink Jet Printer (Print, Scan and Copy)
Item.Review: Good Points: Once you've managed to get it working its great! Bad Points: I had to connect it wired first before connecting it wirelessly, defeats the whole purpose especially if you don't have a printer USB cord which is not supplied!!!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Have 2 weeks now, Easy set up. Quality is brill, and the scanner works a treat, Recieved 2 full original ink cartridges as well. Read alot of reviews prior to purchase and am so happy that i purchased this one. Highly recommended.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I relaced an earlier model with this printer. Problem is the WIFI keeps dropping. I have to reboot my hub each time it drops. Other than that the printer fills my needs and the ink is fairly cheap

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: set up not too bad - a few glitches but overall good. General printing I am finding difficult. Machine seems to default to printing in black and white for some reason and, after pressing heaven knows what I sometimes get a colour print!!! Very hit and miss in this respect and the booklet provided does not help at all. As a result I have only about half of the black ink left (I have only printed about 30 documents). However the print quality is very good and the speed is adequate for my needs.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Done a lot of research before i bought this printer and was a little worried about a few reviews where people had problems setting up the printer. However decided to buy it and am 100% happy with the speed, easy set up and qualiity.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good purchase (If you get one that works!)
Item.Review: I had to take the printer back to Argos because the carriage wouldn't move across to allow me to put the ink in. I got a replacement which worked fine and I'm happy with it. A good printer with cheap ink which is what I've been wanting.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Wish I would have bought this sooner!
Item.Review: Purchaed this printer for my daughter to use at college. The one that she bought with her computer never worked properly so we got this one to replace it.[...]only took a few minutes to set up the wireless connectin. It works great!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is extremely easy to set up and use,giving really good quality prints although I have still to get the hang of Kodak AiO Home Center ( unable to fully understand how to crop etc ).

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
I wish that I had purchased it sooner but was waiting for my old printer to expire! Very versatile piece of kit, easy to set up and very user friendly and “does everything it says on the tin” More than happy with its performance to date but only time will tell how reliable it is. However, Kodak whilst not a front runner in domestic printer sales are not new to the print industry having been established for a hundred years!
Other comments, it does take up a fair chunk of desk space though at 450mm wide x 700mm long and I do question why they did not opt for multiple colour cartridges as a single colour unit whilst more convenient may add to printing costs if what you print has a bias to using one colour. However I was lead to this purchase by their claim to reduce overall print co ... sts so this may well prove to be the case. It also prints direct from memory card although I have not used this facility as yet. Their ‘On line’ support & information and buying consumables purchases will make future maintenance very easy. I have already received a programme update download which came in automatically and it has only been plugged in for a week! My wife said that she would like one but all I have to do is configure her PC to Wi-Fi to enable to print her pictures as well! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak EASYSHARE C310 All-in-One Ink Jet Printer (Print, Scan and Copy)
Item.Review: Good Points: It's very versatile being capable of printing, copying and expanding documents. The colour quality is very good but I have still to see how long the cartidges last. I'm very pleased with the printer. Bad Points: The only one point I can comment about here is the delay in start of printing but once you get used to that it's OK.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: reviewing the second one i had to get because the first one wouldnt turn on at all but argos changed it no problem. is easy to use, tho screen smaller than last "all in one" .. simple cartridge replacment and quality prints.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Kodak C310 printer set up problems
Item.Review: The following has to be sorted or the above is not relevent. I am having problems getting it set up. I was on the phone to KodaK helpline in South Africa, literally all day 9am to 5.30 pm two days ago. The problem is not solved & I am now waiting for another call. Printer looks promising but is no use if not working properly. I will have to return to my Canon - very good but expensive on ink.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: bought this as it was recommend to me. the set up disc didn't work so had to download driver from the internet. will work fine connected to computer, but won't print when connected to wifi.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Fast Print Time
I use the printer to print out documents for the church I belong to. So far I have had no problems with the printer. It prints fast and has good quality, something that I need.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: good quality photo prints. setup very easy the Kodak app to print photos from my iPad is the bees knees well done kodak

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Had other printers but this is by far the best in all areas. easy to use & great photo prints. price doesn't reflect the the quality.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: easy to use good value for money
Item.Review: simple to set up, easy to follow instructions, value for money and does what it says it will do

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Kodak ESP 310 all in one Printer
Item.Review: Printer was very easy to set up,price of ink very cheap,print quality very good.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, great price
Cons: loud
A little loud but fairly quick. great price on ink.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: Noisy and slow but printing quality is good, price of cartridges make it very economical. Easy to set up. very happy with my buy.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: very easy to set up . replacement cartridges ,excellent price.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: Great product, very easy to set-up and use and the low cost ink price is such a bonus.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: easy setup. great features at a reasonable price

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: Value for monny can't go wrong.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This machine was very easy to set up and I have no complaints

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: very good buy. you dont need to buy the ink carridges as the were included in the box. very easy to set up.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: This machine replaced another Kodak printer, but is much better overall and very easy to use . Very pleased with my purchase!!!!

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: An excellent, low cost item.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Review: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-one Printer.
Item.Review: VERY PLEASE WITH THE PRICE of the ink some other wireless printers are easier to install but ov erall am very pleased with this product

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: vERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRINTER FOR THE PRICE.

Item.Item: Kodak ESP C310 All-in-One Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner
Item.Review: I was very disappointed with the photo quality, in terms of colour reproduction, produced by this machine. Set up was easy, if a little time consuming.
